lines: \c[10]Boy\c[0]: Psst!\. Please be quiet!\.
Otherwise, no fish will bite!
\c[10]Boy\c[0]: Hey...\. did you find some worms?
\c[2]\n[2]:\c[0] Yeah.\. There's a whole bunch
crawling around a little further down!
\c[10]Boy:\c[0] Really?\. Super!\. Hold on! I'll check
it out soon!
\c[10]Boy\c[0]: You were right!\. Darn, how could I
have missed this spot?\. Oh well.\. Thanks for
the tip. Now I can finally start fishing.
\c[2]\n[2]:\c[0] Oh... We always like to do
something like that, right, Kento?
\c[1]\n[1]:\c[0] Yeah...\. More or less...\.
\c[10]Boy\c[0]: I even have something to thank you for...\.
Well,\. it's nothing special, but
maybe you can use it.
\c[2]\n[2]:\c[0] Nice! Another
item to trade!
\c[1]\n[1]:\c[0] How? You can trade in that
thing?\. I find that hard to believe.
\c[10]Boy\c[0]: Alright!\. Now back to fishing again.
\c[2]\n[2]:\c[0] Nope... Didn't see any.
\c[10]Boy\c[0]: I still don't find any...\. strange.\.
Usually there are plenty of them here!
\c[1]\n[1]:\c[0] Um..\. hello there little one.\.
Isn't it a little dangerous to walk
around in this area?
\c[10]Boy\c[0]: Yeah,\. I know, but this is the best
place to go fishing...\. Well...\. There's hardly
anything swimming around that's worth fishing...
\c[10]Boy\c[0]: ...And the Lohne is too far away for me...\.
This little lake is simply the best!
\c[1]\n[1]:\c[0] You should be careful
anyway...\. There are some dangerous
beings hanging around here.
\c[10]Boy\c[0]: I know. But don't worry about that.\.
I can run fast.
\c[2]\n[2]:\c[0] What have you caught
so far?
\c[10]Boy\c[0]: Nothing yet.\. I'm looking for some
worms, but today I somehow found none...\.
Usually there are always some around here.
\c[10]Boy\c[0]: Um...\. If you see any worms,
could you let me know?
\c[2]\n[2]:\c[0] Well, why not?
(\c[1]\n[1]:\c[0] Oh man. We're on the way to
Nomerea and we're digging for worms
along the way...\. Just my luck...)
\c[2]\n[2]:\c[0] Well... the worms are here.
\c[2]\n[2]:\c[0] Great. We have to
tell the boy!
\c[1]\n[1]:\c[0] A fairly long fishing rod.
